step: FIX: Resolve Jest SyntaxError due to ESM version of axios by downgrading axios to compatible CommonJS version.
sub_steps: If 'axios' is version 1.x or higher (ESM), change it to '0.27.2' (last CJS-only).
Run 'npm install' in /reactapp to ensure the correct (downgraded) axios version is installed.
Delete any previously generated node_modules/.cache/jest directory to force Jest cache reset if exists.
description: Downgrades axios to a Jest-compatible (CommonJS) version to resolve SyntaxError, allowing React Jest tests to import axios with create-react-app/rjs Jest setup.

step: Compile, build, lint, and test the React frontend.
sub_steps: Run npm install in /reactapp to install dependencies.
Run npx eslint src/ --fix in /reactapp to auto-fix lint issues.
Run npm run test:ci in /reactapp and review results for all implemented test cases.
description: Verifies frontend app builds, lints cleanly, and passes all Jest tests as required.
